parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seat belt retractor can cause the seat belt to remain loose, compromising the safety of the occupant in the event of an accident, which can lead to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The seat belt will not retract into its holder
the seat belt is stuck and cannot be pulled out
the seat belt is loose and will not provide adequate protection
the seat belt is difficult to remove due to stuck bolts.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Rear Cradle Bolts and Retainers Rusting and Disconnecting
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The rusting and disconnection of rear cradle bolts and retainers can cause a loss of steering control, leading to accidents or loss of vehicle control.
symptoms: No steering
difficulty turning
loss of steering control
rusting or corrosion of rear cradle bolts and retainers.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of door handles can cause inconvenience and difficulty entering or exiting the vehicle, potentially leading to safety issues in emergency situations.
symptoms: Door handles cracking or breaking
door cannot be opened from the outside
door handles need to be replaced.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The disconnection of sliding doors can cause inconvenience and difficulty entering or exiting the vehicle, potentially leading to safety issues in emergency situations.
symptoms: Sliding door disconnects from track when opening
difficulty opening or closing sliding doors.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear cradle due to corrosion can cause the steering shaft to disconnect from the steering gear, resulting in a loss of steering control, which can lead to accidents or loss of vehicle control.
symptoms: The steering wheel spins freely
the vehicle is difficult to steer
the vehicle pulls to one side
the steering shaft disconnects from the steering gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering column can cause the steering wheel to lock or break, resulting in a loss of steering control, which can lead to accidents or loss of vehicle control.
symptoms: The steering wheel locks
the steering column breaks
the vehicle is difficult to steer.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of power steering components, such as the rack and pinion, can cause the steering system to malfunction, resulting in a loss of steering control, which can lead to accidents or loss of vehicle control.
symptoms: The steering wheel makes noise when turning
the steering system is difficult to operate
the power steering system fails.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of brake and suspension components, such as brake rotors and tie rods, can cause the vehicle to vibrate or pull to one side, resulting in a loss of vehicle control, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle vibrates when braking
the vehicle pulls to one side
the brake rotors and tie rods wear out prematurely.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the sliding door can prevent passengers from quickly escaping in an emergency, posing a significant safety risk.
symptoms: The sliding door will not open from the inside
the sliding door will not open at all
the lock mechanism breaks off inside the door.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The difficulty in closing the rear hatch latch can cause inconvenience and potentially lead to accidents if the hatch is not properly secured.
symptoms: The rear hatch latch is hard to close.
